title.rendered: Sifu Och Kids Summer Day Camp

content.rendered:
It’s only February, but the days are growing longer, and the temperatures are slowly starting to rise. Summer is right around the corner! Therefore, it is time to start thinking about who will be taking care of your children during the day while you’re away at work, and most likely there are several options for you to consider. You can leave them with a family member, hire a full-time babysitter, or enroll them in a day care center. Yet have you ever considered registering your Kids Summer Day Camp?

When thinking about summer camp, individuals typically envision children experiencing the great outdoors, sleeping on bunk beds in a log cabin, hiking through the wilderness, roasting marshmallows over an open fire, and swimming or canoeing in a fish-filled lake. Although many summer camps of this variety do exist, they can cost thousands of dollars and your child can be hundreds of miles from home for weeks or even months.You can leave them with a family member, hire a full-time babysitter, or enroll them in a day care center. Yet have you ever considered registering your Kids Summer Day Camp.

Luckily, Lakeland Florida boasts several affordable day camps, each centered on different interests. For example, some focus solely on sports while others give children the opportunity to enhance their musical talents. On the other hand, some summer programs concentrate on academic enrichment, where campers engage in hands-on learning activities in math, science, etc. In addition, many Lakeland day camps are operated by trusted organizations such as area schools, universities, recreational facilities, museums, and churches.

However, the youth day camp hosted by Sifu Och Wing Chun in downtown Lakeland is one of the most unique summer programs in Polk County. Rather than practicing just one skill during the summer, children participating in Sifu Och’s summer camp are exposed to a variety of different activities led by certified staff members, including professional dance instructor Kevin Rios of Just Dance Academy of Dance and Ettiquette and Eastern U.S.A. International Black Belt Hall of Famer Sifu Justin Och.

Campers engage in professional dance, culinary arts, theater, arts and crafts, music, kung fu, taekwondo, Chinese ju-jitsu, karate, and boxing Monday through Friday from June to August. Therefore, children get the opportunity to broaden their horizons, to find out what activities they enjoy the most and will continue to pursue in the future. Furthermore,You can leave them with a family member, hire a full-time babysitter, or enroll them in a day care center. Yet have you ever considered registering your Kids Summer Day Camp. Sifu Och campers also participate in movie days and field trips to Barnett Family Park, Polk Museum of Art and other fun area locations. What a great alternative to sitting around the house this summer playing video games, watching cartoons, and eating unhealthy snack foods!

Although the children learn a little from all sorts of practices, the most important thing Sifu Och and his volunteers instill in their summer campers are basic life principles such as

discipline, teamwork, responsibility, respect, and restraint. In fact, before children can engage in martial arts and receive their Wing Chun Kung Fu uniforms, they must demonstrate the above characteristics. Additionally, Sifu Och and his staff require children to clean up after themselves, help others in need, and control their behavior. If certain campers are unable to act with discipline, their privilege to participate in activities is revoked. As a result, it’s highly likely you’ll see a positive change in your child’s behavior and attitude because of Sifu Och’s disciplined summer program.You can leave them with a family member, hire a full-time babysitter, or enroll them in a day care center. Yet have you ever considered registering your Kids Summer Day Camp.

To register your child for Sifu Justin Och’s Kids Summer Day Camp at his downtown Lakeland Florida studio on 116 E. Pine St. call 863-800-0171 today.

Sifu Och’s Kids Summer Day Camp

to start your journey contact sifuoch@facebook.com
Sifu Justin Och Wing Chun in downtown lakeland florida
Sifu Justin Och Black and Gold Sash Wing Chun Gung Fu
Facebook – group page
Facebook – fan page

@graph.description: Sifu Justin Och has direct Ip Man lineage instruction under the Ip Ching, Ip Chun, Simon Lau, and Moy Yat system and spent his life training and advancing students in the Wing Chun Kung Fu system here in Lakeland Florida. He is also the Southeastern USA Regional Director of the World Ving Tsun Association for the America's.
